name: Nice Double Bed
description: An extra large bed to share with your beloved, or maybe to have all to yourself!

name: Nice Sofa
description: Because your rump deserves only the nicest things.

name: Bee Box
description: A home for bees. The bees will travel to nearby flowers to collect pollen and create honey. If there are 12 of the same type of flowers within six tiles of the bee box, the bees will create honey. The honey's flavor and effects are altered by the flowers the bees collect from.

name: Wooden Wardrobe
description: A handsome wardrobe made of deeply varnished wood.

name: Tier 2 House Permit
description: Requirement to craft a tier 2 house upgrade kit at a crafting table. Sold by Emmett at the Town Hall.

name: Demolition Kit
description: Don't like where you built your house or barn? Just move it somewhere else!

name: Mailbox Demolition Kit
description: Don't like where you built your mailbox? Just move it somewhere else!
